amendment.description: An amendment numbered 34 printed in House Report 118-158 to strike funding for the Office of Resolution Management, Diversity and Inclusion.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Greene (GA) amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 204 - 227 (Roll no. 372).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A006) offered by Ms. Greene (GA).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Greene (GA) amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 204 - 227 (Roll no. 372).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
